Actors: NoÃ©mie Kocher, E.R. Ruiz, Garett Pringle, Debbie Lynch-White
Plot: Trying to atone for how he was repulsed by his mother when she became sick and lost her beauty, a tormented 19-year old boy convinces a group of disfigured patients to declare war on beauty by using their "ugliness" as a weapon.
